Text: thank youMr Lay We have not met but I want to thank you for the letter you sent to all employees re Sept I am a stillnew employee years of Portland General Electric a wholly owned electric utility subsidiary but I want to tell you how proud I am of being a member of a team so dedicated to doing its best at all times even in the absolute worst of times as weve experienced in the last month I only hope that if PGE must leave the Enron family we will be able to maintain the same high level of respect and integrity weve achieved to date I am proud to be an EnronPGE employee Regards Jeana McClure e Web Specialist III Portland General Electric Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals
